name: rabbit story (itch)
description:
inspired by fast paced bishi-bashi arcade games, as well as the infinite dino runner on chrome.

sounds sourced from freesound.org

unity bug note: audio is looping as scripted in unity hub, but intermittently stops looping after upload to html site (https://issuetracker.unity3d.com/issues/webgl-a-looping-audio-sounds-different-o...)

special thanks to DY and Jay for the guidance and reassurance<3
